entries.source: Enable or disable executing regular inline Dataview queries.
entries.translated: Enable or disable executing regular inline Dataview queries.

entries.source: Enable or disable executing DataviewJS queries.
entries.translated: Enable or disable executing DataviewJS queries.

entries.source: Enable or disable executing inline DataviewJS queries. Requires that DataviewJS queries are enabled.
entries.translated: Enable or disable executing inline DataviewJS queries. Requires that DataviewJS queries are enabled.

entries.source: Enable inline field highlighting in reading view
entries.translated: Enable inline field highlighting in reading view

entries.source: Enables or disables visual highlighting / pretty rendering for inline fields in reading view.
entries.translated: Enables or disables visual highlighting / pretty rendering for inline fields in reading view.

entries.source: Enable inline field highlighting in Live Preview
entries.translated: Enable inline field highlighting in Live Preview

entries.source: Enables or disables visual highlighting / pretty rendering for inline fields in Live Preview.
entries.translated: Enables or disables visual highlighting / pretty rendering for inline fields in Live Preview.

entries.source: Keyword for DataviewJS blocks. Defaults to 'dataviewjs'. Reload required for changes to take effect.
entries.translated: Keyword for DataviewJS blocks. Defaults to 'dataviewjs'. Reload required for changes to take effect.

entries.source: The prefix to inline queries (to mark them as Dataview queries). Defaults to '='.
entries.translated: The prefix to inline queries (to mark them as Dataview queries). Defaults to '='.

entries.source: The prefix to JavaScript inline queries (to mark them as DataviewJS queries). Defaults to '$='.
entries.translated: The prefix to JavaScript inline queries (to mark them as DataviewJS queries). Defaults to '$='.

entries.source: If enabled, inline queries will also be evaluated inside full code blocks.
entries.translated: If enabled, inline queries will also be evaluated inside full code blocks.

entries.source: If toggled off, the small number in the result header of TASK and TABLE queries will be hidden.
entries.translated: If toggled off, the small number in the result header of TASK and TABLE queries will be hidden.

entries.source: If set, queries which return 0 results will render a warning message.
entries.translated: If set, queries which return 0 results will render a warning message.

entries.source: What null/non-existent should show up as in tables, by default. This supports Markdown notation.
entries.translated: What null/non-existent should show up as in tables, by default. This supports Markdown notation.

entries.source: If enabled, views will automatically refresh when files in your vault change; this can negatively affect some functionality like embeds in views, so turn it off if such functionality is not working.
entries.translated: If enabled, views will automatically refresh when files in your vault change; this can negatively affect some functionality like embeds in views, so turn it off if such functionality is not working.

entries.source: How long to wait (in milliseconds) for files to stop changing before updating views.
entries.translated: How long to wait (in milliseconds) for files to stop changing before updating views.

entries.source: The default date format (see Luxon date format options). Currently: 12 06, 2025
entries.translated: The default date format (see Luxon date format options). Currently: 12 06, 2025

entries.source: The default date and time format (see Luxon date format options). Currently: 12:53 下午 - 12 06, 2025
entries.translated: The default date and time format (see Luxon date format options). Currently: 12:53 下午 - 12 06, 2025

entries.source: The name of the default ID column in tables; this is the auto-generated first column that links to the source file.
entries.translated: The name of the default ID column in tables; this is the auto-generated first column that links to the source file.

entries.source: The name of the default ID column in tables, when the table is on grouped data; this is the auto-generated first columnthat links to the source file/group.
entries.translated: The name of the default ID column in tables, when the table is on grouped data; this is the auto-generated first columnthat links to the source file/group.

entries.source: Only available when "automatic task completion tracking" is enabled.
entries.translated: Only available when "automatic task completion tracking" is enabled.

entries.source: Only available when "automatic task completion tracking" is enabled and "use emoji shorthand for completion" is disabled.
entries.translated: Only available when "automatic task completion tracking" is enabled and "use emoji shorthand for completion" is disabled.

entries.source: If enabled, completing a task in a Dataview will automatically complete its subtasks too.
entries.translated: If enabled, completing a task in a Dataview will automatically complete its subtasks too.
